metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - File
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\osksupport.dll')) OR lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\dllhost.exe') AND lower(file.path) = lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\windows media player\\\\osk.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)
